page.title: 06SPORT AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Our survey of{sport and leisure {activities}showed that children do more than their parents, though their mothers were very close behind in the number of activities.The most popular of the{children's activities}was the {Scout/Guide}movement with nearly half the children being involved.{Drama}and {Dance}were close behind but with fewer boys.{Football, Swimming ,Riding}and {Music}were enjoyed by less than 10% each. { Mothers}enjoyed society activities like{W.I.,N.H.R.,M.U.}(about a third),and sports{(Badminton,Yoga {Keep-fit,Riding,Skittles)} equally. { Fathers}were involved in about half the number of activities, mostly sport,{Skittles ,Swimming and {Football} being the most popular. The weekly papers for 4th July showed 17 sporting activites.
